long_description: crown point solutions came into existence 20 years ago in october 2003, after the entirety of an it department was set free following the acquisition of national technological university by sylvan learning systems. based in northern colorado, crown point solutions has grown from its humble beginnings to serve clients across the united states. our experienced and talented team has navigated these waters for decades, and can help organizations make wise investment choices, in terms of both time and money. specializing web development, seo, and managed it services, the company strives to keep ahead of the curve in the latest business, marketing and technology trends. our company is built solidly upon a foundation of integrity and customer service. building trust with clients is our primary objective, and trust provides the cornerstone upon which to build lasting business relationships. current executives and employees have experience working for large organizations such as sylvan learning systems, hewlett-packard, colorado state university and fujitsu new zealand.
generated_description: crown point solutions is a technology company based in northern colorado that specializes in web development, seo, and managed it services. founded in 2003 by michael bren and blake stewart, the company offers a range of services including web design and development, internet marketing and seo, e-commerce solutions, website and web server security, and managed it services. they also provide business and technology consulting services such as strategy and planning, it project planning, ecommerce consulting, decision support, and data analysis. crown point solutions prides itself on staying up-to-date with the latest business, marketing, and technology trends to help organizations make wise investment choices in terms of both time and money.
